allow: Bash(__NEW_LINE__ echo "Waiting 60 seconds for API to restart...")
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ echo "Deleting PostgreSQL to clear data...")
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ echo "Recreating with fresh data (no persistent storage)...")
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ echo "Waiting 30 seconds for PostgreSQL to start...")

- Docker configurations for containerized deployment
- Azure Container Apps deployment scripts
- Prisma schema with multi-tenant support
- Comprehensive test suites

Infrastructure:
- azure-deploy.sh: Managed services deployment
- azure-deploy-containers.sh: All-container deployment
- azure-teardown.sh: Easy resource cleanup

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Azure ACI deployment scripts

- azure-aci-deploy.sh: One-command deployment of full stack
  - PostgreSQL container
  - Redis container  
  - API with Nginx proxy (SSL termination)
  - Automatic database migrations and seeding
  
- azure-aci-teardown.sh: Complete resource cleanup

Usage:
